Notes.Text:
This update for spice fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10873: Fixed a potential heap corruption when demarshalling (bsc#1104448)
- CVE-2018-10893: Fixed a buffer overflow on image lz checks (bsc#1101295)

Vulnerabilities.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in SPICE before version 0.14.1 where the generated code used for demarshalling messages lacked sufficient bounds checks. A malicious client or server, after authentication, could send specially crafted messages to its peer which would result in a crash or, potentially, other impacts.
